snippet.title: Amazing Katamari Damacy - Official trailer (iOS/Android)
snippet.description:
Amazing Katamari Damacy is out today on iOS and Android ! 

► Android : http://bnent.eu/3oLRqO
► iOS : http://bnent.eu/IWMWco

Roll your Katamari into a ball of galactic proportions in this cosmic endless runner.
Help the Prince in this amazing adventure, collect thousands of objects, and team up with your royal cousins on a mission to restore the galaxy.
Rush through lovely levels and help the King of All Cosmos to win back the Queen’s heart. Oh, and save the universe from impending doom!


*Minimum Requirements: iPhone 5s or higher and IOS 10

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
Follow us: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu
Visit us: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
